job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for a Senior Machine Learning Engineer with a strong NLP focus to design, develop, and optimize AI-driven language technology solutions. This role is ideal for someone passionate about natural language processing, machine learning, and applied AI, who enjoys working in a collaborative, fast-moving environment and wants to contribute to the success of a growing SaaS company., Train, fine-tune, and benchmark state-of-the-art ML models, leveraging recent advancements in deep learning.
   Develop and optimize Large Language Model (LLM)-based solutions, leveraging prompt engineering, fine-tuning, and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) techniques to enhance language processing capabilities.
   Develop and automate scalable NLP pipelines for model evaluation, feature extraction, and fine-tuning, ensuring reproducibility, efficient data handling, and seamless orchestration of multi-step workflows.
   Engineer and extract meaningful features from structured and unstructured language data to improve model accuracy and robustness.
   Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate ML solutions into our platforms and services.
   Stay up to date with the latest NLP and AI research, identifying opportunities to incorporate cutting-edge techniques into our products.
job_details.full_text:
ML Engineer (NLP focus)

We are looking for a Senior Machine Learning Engineer with a strong NLP focus to design, develop, and optimize AI-driven language technology solutions. This role is ideal for someone passionate about natural language processing, machine learning, and applied AI, who enjoys working in a collaborative, fast-moving environment and wants to contribute to the success of a growing SaaS company., Train, fine-tune, and benchmark state-of-the-art ML models, leveraging recent advancements in deep learning.
   Develop and optimize Large Language Model (LLM)-based solutions, leveraging prompt engineering, fine-tuning, and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) techniques to enhance language processing capabilities.
   Develop and automate scalable NLP pipelines for model evaluation, feature extraction, and fine-tuning, ensuring reproducibility, efficient data handling, and seamless orchestration of multi-step workflows.
   Engineer and extract meaningful features from structured and unstructured language data to improve model accuracy and robustness.
   Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate ML solutions into our platforms and services.
   Stay up to date with the latest NLP and AI research, identifying opportunities to incorporate cutting-edge techniques into our products.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with Large Language Models (LLMs), including prompt engineering, fine-tuning, and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). While it mentions 'ML Engineer' in the title, the core responsibilities and technologies described align more closely with a GenAI Engineer focused on language-based generative models and applications.

phrases: Train, fine-tune, and benchmark state-of-the-art ML models, leveraging recent advancements in deep learning.

Develop and optimize Large Language Model (LLM)-based solutions, leveraging prompt engineering, fine-tuning, and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) techniques to enhance language processing capabilities.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly describe the core activities of building, adapting, and optimizing machine learning models, with a specific focus on generative models like LLMs and techniques like fine-tuning and RAG.

phrases: Develop and automate scalable NLP pipelines for model evaluation, feature extraction, and fine-tuning, ensuring reproducibility, efficient data handling, and seamless orchestration of multi-step workflows.
Engineer and extract meaningful features from structured and unstructured language data to improve model accuracy and robustness.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases cover the creation of data pipelines for NLP tasks, including feature extraction and data handling, which are key components of data engineering for ML/GenAI.

phrases: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate ML solutions into our platforms and services.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the need to integrate developed ML solutions into existing software platforms and services, a core aspect of software development in an applied AI context.

phrases: Develop and automate scalable NLP pipelines for model evaluation, feature extraction, and fine-tuning, ensuring reproducibility, efficient data handling, and seamless orchestration of multi-step workflows.
job_tasks.justification: The mention of automating scalable pipelines, ensuring reproducibility, and orchestrating workflows points to MLOps practices for managing the lifecycle of ML models.

phrases: This role is ideal for someone passionate about natural language processing, machine learning, and applied AI, who enjoys working in a collaborative, fast-moving environment and wants to contribute to the success of a growing SaaS company.
Stay up to date with the latest NLP and AI research, identifying opportunities to incorporate cutting-edge techniques into our products.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases highlight the need to understand the business context (SaaS company success) and to proactively identify and apply new research to product development, demonstrating business alignment and innovation.
